name: BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.getDescriptor
description: The BluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.getDescriptor() method returns a Promise that resolves to the first BluetoothGATTDescriptor for a given descriptor UUID.
content:
This is an experimental technology
Check the Browser compatibility table carefully before using this in production.

TheBluetoothRemoteGATTCharacteristic.getDescriptor()method returns a Promise that resolves to the firstBluetoothGATTDescriptor for a given descriptor UUID.
